meanings.definition: Conduces: to contribute to a result or outcome
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy conduces to a strong body.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise conduces to better health.
meanings.sent3: His habit of reading before bed conduces to interesting dreams.
meanings.sent4: Positive thinking conduces to a brighter outlook on life.
meanings.sent5: Studying diligently conduces to academic success.

meanings.definition: Conduces: to lead or guide to a particular result or outcome
meanings.sent1: Following the map conduces us to the park.
meanings.sent2: Good communication conduces to understanding between people.
meanings.sent3: The helpful signs conduces visitors to the museum entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance conduces the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The clear instructions conduces to a successful project completion.
